room_title: Escape room "Operation Dive" by Exit Escape Room in New York
room_description:
The USS Growler submarine has been decommissioned since 1964, but with the sudden rise of a new attack threat to New York City from a hostile enemy submarine carrying a destructive missile due to be deployed in one hour, the Pentagon has ordered an immediate counter-operation.
With the absence of naval submarines on the East Coast, you and your team were ordered to re-activate the Growler, submerge her and carry out "Operation Dive". Can you stop the attack and save the city before time expires?
